description.value: Primary Energy: Space 8 (controlling mind + medium range) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 10 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Humanoid target at medium range makes [[/save type=will]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, you control target's actions (won't take obviously harmful actions). Target can repeat save when taking damage (1 success ends effect). Saving Throw: Will Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 1 hour, 5 = 4 hours
